Medical management of vulnerable and underserved patients :
[edited by] Talmadge E. King, Jr., Margaret B. Wheeler.

Vulnerable populations and health disparities: an overview / Kevin Grumbach ... [et al.] -- Health care disparities: an overview / Andrew B. Bindman, Kevin Grumbach, and Talmadge E. King, Jr. -- Financing and organization of healthcare for vulnerable populations / Virginia W. Huang and Christopher B. Forrest -- Legal issues in the care of underserved populations / Sara Rosenbaum and Sara E. Wilensky -- Principles in the ethical care of underserved patients / Bernard Lo -- Creating a context for effective intervention in the clinical care of vulnerable patients / Dean Schillinger, Teresa J. Villela, and George William Saba -- Promoting behavior change / Daniel S. Lessler and Christopher Dunn -- Assessing and promoting medical adherence / Kirsten Bibbins-Domingo and M. Robin DiMatteo -- Navigating cross-cultural communication / JudyAnn Bigby -- Improving the effectiveness of patient education: a focus on limited health literacy / Michael K. Paasche-Orlow and Ruth M. Parker -- The home visit/mobile outreach / Dan Wlodarczyk and Margaret B. Wheeler -- Group medical visits for underserved populations / Hali Hammer -- Applying interactive health technologies for vulnerable populations / John D. Piette and Dean Schillinger -- Applying principles and practice of quality improvement to better care for the underserved / Gordon D. Schiff and Seijeoung Kim -- Case management/multidisciplinary care models / Michelle Schneidermann and Alicia Fernandez -- Health and the community / Naomi Wortis, Ellen Beck, and Joanne Donsky -- Underserved children: preventing chronic illness and promoting health / Patricia Barreto, Victor H. Perez, and Neal Halfon -- Adolescence and its vulnerabilities / William B. Shore, Margaret A. Scott, and Ellen M. Scarr -- The family as the context for care / George William Saba and Teresa J. Villela -- The hidden poor: care of the elderly / Helen Chen and C. Seth Landefeld -- Work, living environment, and health / Janet Victoria Diaz and John R. Balmes -- Care of the dying patient / Lavera M. Crawley -- Clinical care for persons with a history of incarceration / Emily A. Wang, Jacqueline P. Tulsky, and Mary C. White -- Care of the homeless patient / Margot Kushel and Sharad Jain -- Immigrant health issues / Susana Morales -- Providing care to patients who speak limited English / Alice Hm Chen and Elizabeth A. Jacobs -- Sexuality and vulnerability: the care of lesbian and gay patients / Anne Rosenthal and Allison Diamant -- The medical treatment of patients with psychiatric illness / Douglas R. Price-Hanson -- Women's health: reproduction and beyond in poor women / Elizabeth Harleman and Jody Steinauer -- Intimate partner violence / Leigh Kimberg -- Obesity as a clinical and social problem / Ann Smith Barnes, Marisa Rogers, and Cam-Tu Tran -- Chronic pain management in vulnerable populations / Michael B. Potter, Yeva M. Johnson, and Barry D. Zevin -- Principles of caring for alcohol and drug users / Alexander Y. Walley and F. Joseph Roll -- Tobacco use / Clemens Hong ... [et al.] -- Dental care: the forgotten need / Matthew Nealon and Francisco Ramos-Gomez -- Chronic disease / Margaret B. Wheeler, Teresa J. Villela, and Thomas S. Bodenheimer -- Disability and patients with disabilities / Margot Kushel and Lisa I. Iezzoni -- HIV/AIDS: impact on vulnerable populations / Meg D. Newman and Margaret B. Wheeler -- Care of ill socially complicated patients in the hospital / Jeffrey M. Critchfield and Mark V. Williams -- Caring for oneself while caring for others / Lee Lipsenthal -- Advocacy / Thomas P. O'Toole.

Directory of organizations serving international visitors in the Nation's Capital.
Edited by: Allison Travis Brown, Irena Z. Roberts [and] Margaret K. Wheeler.
At head of title: Greater Washington Council of Organizations Serving International Visitors.

Earlier editions by Foreign Student Service Council, Washington, D.C. Preliminary ed. published in 1960 under title: Directory of organizations and agencies offering services to foreign visitors in Greater Washington.
Kept up to date by periodic correction lists.
